name: Fried Sandwich
ingredients: 4-6 slices of deli meat (e.g., ham, turkey, chicken)
Optional: mayonnaise, mustard, lettuce, tomato, pickles
steps: Spread butter on one side of each bread slice.
Place a slice of cheese on one bread slice.
Layer the deli meat on top of the cheese.
Add any desired additional toppings like mayonnaise, mustard, lettuce, tomato, or pickles.
Top with the other bread slice, buttered side facing up.
Heat a skillet or frying pan over medium heat.
Place the sandwich in the pan and cook until the bottom bread slice is golden brown.
Flip the sandwich and cook until the other side is golden brown and the cheese has melted.
Remove from the pan and let it cool for a minute.
Cut the sandwich in half or quarters, and serve hot.
